title: Night store
body:
[D] Suddenly my [G] dream is gone and [D] i...
I wake up [G] again and wonder [A] why
I am all out of [F#m] sheep to [Bm] count
Give me [G] more

[D] Now i wish i could [G] hide your [D] smile
Underneath my [G] pillow for a [A] while
Time is going [F#m]  deeper in the [Bm] night
and i [G] leave

[G] Night store has everything and 
I see [A] there's so much

On your [D] right, there's a [G] fire burning [D] bright
and the [G] shelves they seem to [Bm] break
How we [A] wish the ceiling was the [G] sky
but a [A] glass 
full of [D] wine
[G] to be [D] drained
coz you won't [G] escape your [Bm] thirst
better [A] steal and run [G] away
wine is [F#m] mixing with the [G] night
[G] and i just [D] can't
[G] i can't fall [D] asleep

[D] am i number [G] 8 of seven [D] dwarfs
far away from [G] diamonds in their [A] caves
movies lie [F#m] again to you snow- [Bm] white
am i [G] right?

[D] a sheet is turning [G] me into a [D] cloud
i apologize to my [G] bed out [A] loud
so i go to [F#m] steer into the [Bm] night
i go and [G] buy

[G] Night store has everything and 
I see [A] there's so much

On your [D] right, there's a [G] fire burning [D] bright
and the [G] shelves they seem to [Bm] break
How we [A] wish the ceiling was the [G] sky
but a [A] glass 
full of [D] wine
[G] to be [D] drained
coz you won't [G] escape your [Bm] thirst
better [A] steal and run [G] away
wine is [F#m] mixing with the [G] night
[G] and i just [D] can't
[G] i can't fall [D] asleep
bodyLyrics:
Suddenly my dream is gone and i...
I wake up again and wonder why
I am all out of sheep to count
Give me more

Now i wish i could hide your smile
Underneath my pillow for a while
Time is going deeper in the night
and i leave

Night store has everything and 
I see there's so much

On your right, there's a fire burning bright
and the shelves they seem to break
How we wish the ceiling was the sky
but a glass 
full of wine
to be drained
coz you won't escape your thirst
better steal and run away
wine is mixing with the night
and i just can't
i can't fall asleep

am i number 8 of seven dwarfs
far away from diamonds in their caves
movies lie again to you snow- white
am i right?

a sheet is turning me into a cloud
i apologize to my bed out loud
so i go to steer into the night
i go and buy

Night store has everything and 
I see there's so much

On your right, there's a fire burning bright
and the shelves they seem to break
How we wish the ceiling was the sky
but a glass 
full of wine
to be drained
coz you won't escape your thirst
better steal and run away
wine is mixing with the night
and i just can't
i can't fall asleep
